titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Records of the Office of the President, Linda G. Mills RG.3.0.14
titlestmt.author: Nicole Greenhouse

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-02-22 16:41:50 -0500.

change.item: Edited by Nicole Greenhouse to add updated administrative information and additional websites

did.unittitle: Records of the Office of the President, Linda G. Mills

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: New York University. Office of the President

did.abstract: The Office of the President is the top administrative office and is responsible for the management of the entire University structure. The duties of the President included the development, implementation, and monitoring of University activities, the cultivation of outreach programs, and the promotion of University activities to prospective donors and to the general public. Linda G. Mills was named the 17th president of New York University in February 2023, and officially took up her duties as NYU's president on July 1, 2023. This collection consists of materials created and collected by her office during his administration.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Administrative records and unpublished reports of New York University are closed for a period of 20 years from the date of their creation. Access to files spanning multiple years will be opened to researchers based on the date of the most recent materials. Board of Trustees records are closed for 35 years from the date of creation. Materials related to personnel, grievances, job and fellowship searches and applications, and all files that fall under the federal Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA) are permanently restricted. Additional restrictions may apply to other materials in this collection. For questions regarding specific restrictions, please contact the University Archives.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Office of the President is the top administrative office and is responsible for the management of the entire University structure. The duties of the President included the development, implementation, and monitoring of University activities, the cultivation of outreach programs, and the promotion of University activities to prospective donors and to the general public. Linda G. Mills was named the 16th president of New York University in February 2023, and officially took up her duties as NYU's president on July 1, 2023.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Records of the Office of the President, Linda G. Mills; RG 3.0.14; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.

To cite the archived website in this collection: Identification of item, date; Records of the Office of the President, Linda G. Mills; RG 3.0.14; Wayback URL; New York University Archives, New York University.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by creator name are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact university-archives@nyu.edu.

appraisal.head: Take Down Policy
appraisal.p: Archived websites are made accessible for purposes of education and research. NYU Libraries have given attribution to rights holders when possible; however, due to the nature of archival collections, we are not always able to identify this information.
If you hold the rights to materials in our archived websites that are unattributed, please let us know so that we may maintain accurate information about these materials.

If you are a rights holder and are concerned that you have found material on this website for which you have not granted permission (or is not covered by a copyright exception under US copyright laws), you may request the removal of the material from our site by submitting a notice, with the elements described below, to the repository email.

Please include the following in your notice: Identification of the material that you believe to be infringing and information sufficient to permit us to locate the material; your contact information, such as an address, telephone number, and email address; a statement that you are the owner, or authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed and that you have a good-faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; a statement that the information in the notification is accurate and made under penalty of perjury; and your physical or electronic signature. Upon receiving a notice that includes the details listed above, we will remove the allegedly infringing material from public view while we assess the issues identified in your notice.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate/nyu-s-17th-president.html, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate/about-linda-g-mills.html, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate/publications-and-films.html, and https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate.html were selected by Janet Bunde and captured through the use of Archive-It. Archive-It uses web crawling technology to capture websites at a scheduled time and displays only an archived copy, from the resulting WARC file, of the website. The accession number associated with these websites are 2023.011. In May 2023, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ve78NXU1RlU was added. The accession number associated with this website is 2023.025. In June 2023, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration.html and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D27LgJhhcu0 were added. The accession number associated with these websites is 2023.033. In July 2023, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president.html and https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president/comms.html were added. The accession number associated with these websites is 2023.041. In October 2023, https://www.nyu.edu/life/inauguration-week.html was added. The accession number associated with this website is 2023.051. In February 2024, https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president/presidential-internship-program.html and https://www.nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president/strategic-pathways.html were added to the web archives. The accession number associated with these websites is 2024.012.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains websites related to Linda G. Mills' designation as next NYU president, her inauguration as NYU President in October 2023, and actions and announcements as president of the university.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The resource record was created in February 2023 before Mills took up the position as president. Information about the future president and description related to the archived websites were created. Additional websites were added in 2023-2024.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Due to technical or privacy issues, archived websites may not be exact copies of the original website at the time of the web crawl. Certain file types will not be captured dependent on how they are embedded in the site. Other parts of websites that the crawler has difficulty capturing includes Javascript, streaming content, database-driven content, and highly interactive content. Full-Text searches of archived websites are available at https://archive-it.org/organizations/567.

appraisal.head: Appraisal
appraisal.p: Crawl was limited to domains and subdomains of nyu.edu/about/leadership-university-administration/president-designate and nyu.edu/content/nyu/en/about/leadership-university-administration/office-of-the-president in order to remain within the collection scope and data constraints.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Websites documenting the office of the NYU president designate, Linda G. Mills. The websites contain a biography of Mills, her job announcement by the Board of Trustees, messages from Mills to the NYU community, strategic plan for NYU, the Presidential Internship Program, and a listing of her publications and films. The websites also documents the transition from president designate to president of NYU.

The Inauguration Week website documents the week-long celebration of the inauguration of Linda G. Mills as the 17th president of New York University. The website contains a video of the inauguration ceremony and event descriptions.
